title: Market research for requirements analysis using linguistic tools
full_text:
ERRATUM
Luisa Mich Æ Mariangela Franch
Pier Luigi Novi Inverardi
Market research for requirements analysis using linguistic tools
Published online: 1 April 2004
/C211Springer-Verlag London Limited 2004
Requirements Eng (2004) 9:40–56
The publishers regret that the paper ‘‘Market research
for requirements analysis using linguistic tools’’ in vol-
ume 9/1 contained an error in the names of the authors.
These should have appeared as Luisa Mich, Mari-
angela Franch, Pier Luigi Novi Inverardi. The publish-
ers apologise for this error.
The online version of the original article can be found at http://
dx.doi.org/10.1007/s00766-003-0179-8
